titles.title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1992 to authorize the Secretary of the Army to pay the non-Federal share for managing recreation facilities and natural resources to water resource development projects if the non-Federal interest has agreed to reimburse the Secretary, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1992 to authorize the Secretary of the Army to pay for the non-Federal share of work carried out by a non-Federal interest under the challenge cost-sharing program for the management of recreation facilities and natural resources at water resource development projects if the Secretary has entered into binding legal agreement with the non-Federal interest that provides for reimbursement of such payment by such non-Federal interest during or after completion of such work.
